aanduwen yanakan api enne na…..wipakshaye asungath 15dena shrilanipa madhyama karaka sabhawa warjanaya karayi shri lanka nidahas pakshaya jathika aanduwen iwath wanathuru ema pakshaye madhyama karaka sabha raswima warjanaya kirimata 15 denage kandayama thiranaya kara thibena bawath ee anuwa janadhipathi maithripala sirisena mahathage pradhanathwayen ada (20da) pawathwimata niyamitha shri lanka nidahas pakshaye madhyamakaraka sabha raswimata 15 denage kandayame kisiwaku sahabhagi nowana bawath hitapu amathya lakshman yapa abewardhana mahatha prakasha kaleya.
